title: Quark citrus soufflés
ingredients: ['For the souffle', '15 g (½ oz) unsalted butter, melted', '115 g (4 oz) caster sugar', '4 eggs, separated', '30 g (1 oz) cornflour', '250 g (8½ oz) quark cheese', 'finely grated zest of 1 lime', 'finely grated zest of 1 small orange', 'sifted icing sugar to dust', 'For the strawberry coulis', '300 g (10½ oz) ripe strawberries, halved', '2 teaspoons icing sugar, or to taste, sifted', 'dash of liqueur, such as kirsch (optional)']
